title: 我下载了魔界MOD出现了错误代码，求会MOD的大神解决！
author: Smith
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Smith 于 2013-2-20 15:13 编辑 

      我下载了魔界MOD出现了错误代码，求会MOD的大神解决！

                    Minecraft has crashed!

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in server tick loop
A full error report has been saved to C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\桌面\minecraft 1.4.7 简单整合V4.1\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-20_15.13.13-server.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: Fcy_lity
replies.txt_content: mod冲突么，坑定又要撞枪口上了~

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 截图都截的模糊不清，真不知道你怎么会截成这样的。。。

replies.txt_content:
这代码能复制黏贴的。 不需要截图。
黏贴上来谢谢。
